nodes.text: The CQ-3.80 was a multispectrum disguise suite incorporated into the TC-SC infiltration droid by Cybot Galactica. It was an advanced holoprojector that was capable of completely disguising the droid's exterior, even while moving.

The CQ-3.80 was incorporated the TC-SC infiltration droid by Cybot Galactica during the Galactic Civil War. Combining high-definition, miniaturized holoprojectors, speech scramblers, scanners, and bio-sign generators, the CQ-3.80 could mimic and humanoid in the galaxy, droid or sentient being. Because the TC-SC was built with exhaustive cultural and behavioral databases, the CQ-3.80's illusion was nearly impossible to detect except under the intense and invasive scrutiny.
